You hear a chain of explosions from a distance...and they’re getting louder!!! Panicked, you look around the room for shelter, but it’s too late. Right before the explosion hits you, your life flashes before your eyes. You remember your first day at your laboratory, all the times you’ve laughed with your coworkers, the stupid jokes you made, conversations and words and symbols and among them a CODE...

[1: Start Again](room0.txt)
